title: White Stripes De Stijl Album cover
content:
I am needing to ID the font used on the cover of The White Stripes 'De Stijl' album. It has lower case 'e' only three horizontal lines.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203150626im_/http:/typophile.com/files/5d21a6791b156af7f2a134b246d90181_4835.jpg)
author: Couzey

comments.content: Could they have customised Handel Gothic?

Wow! That was FAST! I was thinking that too, or maybe Denmark would work but wanted that 'e' to print correctly.

De Stijl you would think, but what I have found so far doesn't match.
What I don't understand is why they didn't use [the real thing](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203150626/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=PY.114299.0.0).
